name: Professor X
bio: World's most powerful telepath, capable of astral projection, mind control, illusion casting, memory manipulation, psychic blasts, and sensing the presence of nearby mutants.

name: Cyclops
bio: Projects a beam of ruby-colored concussive force from his eyes, which act as interdimensional apertures between this universe and another.
abilities: Gifted strategist, hand-to-hand combatant, and pilot
Immunity to Havok's plasma energy blasts

name: Iceman
birth_place: Port Washington, Long Island, New York
bio: Generates freezing temperatures to create and manipulate ice. Can transform his body into ice.

name: Angel/Archangel
bio: Makes use of the large, feathered wings on his back for natural flight. Also has eagle-like vision and blood with regenerative properties. Can transform into a blue-skinned form with metallic, techno-organic wings, sharp metallic claws, and enhanced physical abilities.

name: Beast
bio: Has superhuman strength, speed, stamina, agility, reflexes, and durability. His feline-like form gives him night vision, minor pheromone control, enhanced senses and claws.
abilities: Superhuman strength, speed, stamina, agility, durability, senses, and dexterity

name: Marvel Girl/Phoenix
bio: Possesses telekinesis and telepathy. As the template of the Phoenix Force, she is able to generate unlimited amounts of energy, travel through time-space, and manipulate matter on a subatomic level.

name: Mimic
bio: Copies other mutants' powers and abilities, sometimes permanently. Retains the original five X-Men's powers indefinitely.

name: Changeling
bio: Shapeshifter able to assume other humanoid forms; a latent telepath.

name: Polaris
bio: Generates magnetic fields to manipulate metal, induce flight, create force fields, and harness energy blasts.

name: Havok
bio: Generates plasma blasts and absorbs cosmic energy.

name: Petra
bio: Earth manipulation; can also change the composition of raw minerals.

name: Sway
bio: Time control, as well as a form of retrocognitive projection.

name: Darwin
bio: Constant reactive evolution.

name: Vulcan
bio: Capable of manipulating different types of energy on a vast scale, including mutant energies. Can survive in the vacuum of space and can fly.
abilities: Vast energy absorption, manipulation, transformation and projection
Limited super power replication and repression

name: Nightcrawler
bio: Neomorphic physiology grants him a prehensile tail, blue fur, invisibility in shadows, night vision, and wall-crawling. Possesses line-of-sight teleportation.
abilities: Skilled in martial arts, hand to hand combat and fencing training

name: Wolverine
bio: Healing factor (regeneration of tissue, immunity to virtually all toxins and pathogens, slowed aging process), enhanced senses, and retractable bone claws. Has the indestructible metal adamantium bonded to his skeleton, allowing enhanced physical attributes and sharp adamantium claws.
abilities: Superhuman senses, strength, agility, stamina, reflexes, and longevity
Six retractable adamantium-laced bone claws (three claws on each hand)

name: Banshee
bio: Sonic scream, flight, enhanced hearing.
abilities: Ability to cause nausea, disorientation, or unconsciousness
Immunity to powers of Black Tom Cassidy

name: Storm
bio: Weather manipulation (lighting bolts, wind, rain, etc.) and flight by 'riding' wind currents.
abilities: Resistance to the effects of the weather and extreme temperatures

name: Sunfire
bio: Generation of nuclear fire, flight by jet propulsion, absorption of and immunity to various kinds of radiation.

name: Colossus
bio: Transforms into living organic metal form, granting superhuman strength and near-invulnerability. Can survive without oxygen or sustenance for long periods while in this form.
abilities: Ability to transform his body into 'organic steel granting him superhuman strength

name: Thunderbird
bio: Superhuman strength, speed, and durability.

name: Shadowcat
bio: Can pass through solid matter ('phasing'), also allowing her to disrupt electronics and walk on air.

name: Rogue
bio: Absorbs powers, memories, and personalities through skin-to-skin contact. Prolonged contact with others can cause her to permanently absorb their traits and potentially kill them.
abilities: Absorption of memories skills, and powers through skin-to-skin contact
Expert at martial arts and unarmed combat

name: Magneto
bio: Generates and controls magnetic fields for manipulating metal, flight, force fields, electrical bolts, and electromagnetic radiation.
abilities: Helmet grants immunity to telepathic attacks

name: Bishop
bio: Can absorb most forms of energy and channel it into blasts or convert it into enhanced strength. Has a bionic arm with enhanced strength, retractable pincers, and time-traveling capabilities.
abilities: Ability to instinctively know present location

name: Gambit
bio: Charges inanimate objects with explosive kinetic energy; enhanced agility and hypnotic charm.
abilities: Control and manipulation of potential energy and kinetic energy

name: Northstar
bio: Superhuman speed, flight, and projection of brilliant flashes of light.

name: Longshot
bio: A warrior from the alternate reality the Mojoverse; not a mutant, but a genetically engineered organism.

name: Psylocke
bio: Twin sister of Captain Britain, a.k.a. Brian Braddock. Has served as a field leader.

name: Iron Man
abilities: A cyberpathic link with a prior version of his powered armored suit

name: Thor
bio: Current member of the main Avengers team and the Avengers Unity Squad.

name: Ant Man (Henry Pym)
bio: Formerly the head of the Avengers Academy and former member of the Secret Avengers. Currently the leader of the Avengers A.I.
abilities: Size-shifting from nearly microscopic to ~100 feet gigantic (both at extremes)
Ability to transfer his size-shifting ability to other beings and objects
Bio-Energy Projection, also known as a Bio-Sting (particularly during his periods as Ant-Man & Yellowjacket)
Flight via grafted wings during his period as Yellowjacket
Telepathic communication with ants via cybernetic helmet as Ant-Man
Superhuman strength, stamina and mass in giant form as Giant-Man, Goliath and Yellowjacket

name: The Wasp (Janet Pym)
status: Usually depicted as having the ability to shrink to a height of perhaps several centimeters, grow to giant size, fly by means of insectoid wings, and fire yellow energy blasts.

name: Hulk
abilities: Super strength, speed, endurance, reflexes, and durability

name: Captain America
bio: Current leader of the main Avengers team and a member of the Avengers Unity Squad.
abilities: Master martial artist and shield fighter
Wields his vibranium-steel alloy shield with hyperkinetic senses

name: Hawkeye
bio: Current member of the main Avengers team, and the Secret Avengers.
abilities: Uses a variety of trick arrows
Master martial artist, acrobat, marksman and swordsman

name: Quicksilver
bio: Joined West Coast branch in Avengers West Coast #56. Joined the Mighty Avengers in Mighty Avengers #24. Former teacher at the Avengers Academy.

name: Scarlet Witch
bio: Joined West Coast branch in West Coast Avengers vol. 2 #37. Disappeared and apparently de-powered at the end of House of M.

name: Black Panther
bio: Current member of the New Avengers.
abilities: Olympic-level strength, speed, reflexes, stamina, and agility
Skilled hunter, scientist, tracker, strategist, inventor, and hand-to-hand combatant
Wields vibranium uniform, boots, and equipment
Wields retractable vibranium claws (which can slice through any substance)

name: Vision
bio: Rebuilt in Avengers vol. 4 #19. Current member Avengers A.I.
abilities: Density control ranging from invulnerability to intangibility
Mass control ranging from extraordinarily heavy to weightlessness
Utilizes phasing into beings/objects then solidifying as a means of molecular disruption, causing pain/damage or death/destruction
Solar energy projection (via eyes or solar jewel on forehead)
Superhuman strength, intelligence, reflexes and senses as an artificial being
Capable of self repair and regeneration as an artificial being

name: Black Widow
bio: Current member of the Secret Avengers.
abilities: Extensive military, hand-to-hand combat, martial arts, and espionage training

name: Mantis
abilities: Ability to communicate telepathically with the Cotati

name: Daredevil
bio: Living in the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood of New York City, Matt Murdock is blinded by a radioactive substance that falls from an oncoming vehicle. While he no longer can see, the radioactive exposure heightens his remaining senses beyond normal human ability.
abilities: Master martial artist, gymnast, and acrobat

name: Spider-Man
bio: Joined as a reserve member. Former member of the New Avengers, while serving concurrently as a member of the Future Foundation.
abilities: Superhuman strength, speed, agility, stamina, reflexes, and endurance
Ability to cling to most surfaces
Able to shoot very strong spider-web strings from wrists via web-shooters

name: Scarlet Spider
bio: Ben Reilly was the most genetically stable of the many clones of Spider-Man created by Professor Miles Warren, the Jackal.
abilities: Superhuman strength, speed, stamina, reflexes, durability, and agility
Ability to cling to most surfaces
Able to shoot impact webbing from devices

name: Venom
bio: The character is a Symbiote, a sentient alien, with a gooey, almost liquid-like form that requires a host, usually human, to bond with for its survival, as with real world symbiotes, and to whom it endows enhanced powers.
abilities: Superhuman strength, agility, reflexes and endurance
Ability to cling to most surfaces

name: Carnage
bio: Carnage was once a serial killer known as Cletus Kasady, and became Carnage after merging with the offspring of the alien symbiote called Venom during a prison breakout.

name: Black Cat
bio: Black Cat is a reformed burglar who continues to walk on the wild side as a detective and adventurer.
abilities: Expert martial artist with excellent gymnastic abilities
Superhuman sense of smell and night vision

name: Iron Lad
bio: Founder. Nathaniel Richards is the young man who will one day become Kang the Conqueror. He is armed with a neuro-kinetic suit given to him by Kang the Conqueror (of the future) that responds to mental commands. He left team to become Kang.
abilities: Possesses neurokinetic armor which responds to his thoughts and allows him to fly
Change the appearance of the armor

name: Hulkling
bio: Original member chosen by Nathaniel. He is a shape-shifter who also possesses enhanced strength and healing. He is the son of Kree hero Captain Mar-Vell and the Skrull princess Anelle; he is a Kree-Skrull hybrid, though Kree law considers him wholly Kree and Skrull law considers him wholly Skrull.

name: Patriot
bio: Original member chosen by Nathaniel. Patriot was revealed to be the grandson of super-soldier Isaiah Bradley and while he initially had no superhuman abilities, he later developed abilities that he claimed he received through a blood transfusion from his grandfather.

name: Wiccan
bio: Original member chosen by Nathaniel. He is the reincarnated son of the Scarlet Witch and the original Vision. Billy uses magic for various effects, such as casting spells for flight, lightning generation, and locating people, and activates these spells by repeating the intended effect out loud. Thomas Shepherd (Speed) is his twin brother.

name: Hawkeye
bio: She forcibly introduced herself into the Young Avengers, saving them from a botched rescue. While Kate has no superhuman abilities, she is competent with a bow and arrow as well as a sword.
abilities: Highly skilled at forms of combat

name: Stature
bio: Daughter of former Ant-Man, the late Scott Lang. She has the power to change size at will.
abilities: Ability to shrink and grow in size

name: Kid Loki
bio: An Asgardian prince and the adoptive brother of the superhero Thor, trapped in the body of a young boy following his death and reincarnation.

name: Marvel Boy
bio: An intergalactic ladies man who has left a trail of broken hearts around the galaxy, Noh-Varr is a Kree superhero.
abilities: Knowledge of advanced Kree technology and weaponry

name: Prodigy
bio: An intergalactic ladies man who has left a trail of broken hearts around the galaxy, Noh-Varr is a Kree superhero.
abilities: Possesses the combined knowledge of every mind he has encountered up to M-Day, including the X-Men

name: Speed
bio: When the Scarlet Witch became desperate to have children, she used her reality-altering powers to create twin boys from two lost souls. Scarlet Witch and Vision named their children William and Thomas and lived normal lives until Mephisto claimed the two souls as his own.
